title: Rename site display title to “Dini GC”

requirements.text: Update the website display name shown in the browser tab (HTML document title) from "Anonymous Global Chat Website" to "Dini GC" without changing the site URL/link.

quotes: can you make the name of the website "Anonymous Global Chat Website" (not the link) to "Dini GC"

acceptanceCriteria: The HTML document <title> is "Dini GC" (replacing "Anonymous Global Chat Website").
After refresh, the browser tab title shows "Dini GC".
No routing, domain, or link/URL text is changed as part of this update.

constraints: Do not change the site URL, links, routing, or canister identifiers; only update the displayed site name/title.
nonGoals: Rebranding or changing other UI copy beyond the specific "Anonymous Global Chat Website" website name/title string.
